briefTitle: In-Office Tympanostomy Tube Placement in Children (OTTER)
officialTitle: A Prospective, Single-arm, Multicenter Study to Evaluate Effectiveness and Safety of Tympanostomy Tube Placement Using the Tula Iontophoresis and Tube Delivery Systems for Children in an Office Setting.
summary: A prospective, single-arm, multicenter study to evaluate effectiveness and safety of Tymbion iontophoresis and tympanostomy tube placement using the Tula Iontophoresis and Tube Delivery Systems for children in an office setting.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day of Procedure (Day 0) Immediately following tube placement

effectByArm.arm: Pivotal Cohort (6 Month to <5 Year Old Children)
Pivotal Cohort (5 Through 12 Year Old Children)
